item.title: Is Nick Ahmed the best defensive shortshop in baseball?
item.description: Nick Ahmed debuted for the Diamondbacks in 2014, blossoming into a two time Gold Glove winner and becoming the Diamondbacks everyday shortshop. Let’s see if he is the best defensive shortshop in baseball using shortshop fielding data from the last four seasons. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.1 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.1.1 ✓ dplyr 1.0.5 ## ✓ tidyr 1.
